summary: PECMS Project Starter template initialized

summary: Starting B1.2: Reinstate Phase 2 Tests & Smoke Coverage

Phase 2 integration tests fully reinstated and operational. All 16 Phase 2 tests passing. Full suite: 742 tests with 94%+ coverage (statements: 94.29%, branches: 85.09%, functions: 95.86%, lines: 94.51%).

summary: Starting B1.3: Refresh Docs, Backlog, and Context

Documentation refresh completed: updated README.md, MASTER_CONTEXT.md, and CURRENT_BUILD.md to reflect Sprint 1 progress. All three missions (B1.1, B1.2, B1.3) completed successfully. 742/742 tests passing with 94%+ coverage.
next_hint: Sprint 1 complete. B2.1 promoted to Current for Sprint 2 execution

summary: Starting B2.1: Hybrid Token Counter Integration - Implementing offline TokenizerFactory with gpt-tokenizer, Transformers.js, and enhanced heuristics

Hybrid token counter integration complete: implemented TokenizerFactory with gpt-tokenizer (100% accurate GPT), Transformers.js (Claude w/ known drift), and enhanced 1.5x heuristic (Gemini). Fully offline, no API keys required. 745/745 tests passing.
next_hint: B2.2 promoted to Current for MCP server tool registration

summary: Starting B2.2: Register Intelligence Tools in MCP Server - exposing optimize_tokens, split_mission, suggest_splits

Registered optimize_tokens, split_mission, and suggest_splits tools in MCP server with async token counting. All three intelligence tools exposed via MCP with proper handlers and tool definitions. 750/750 tests passing.
next_hint: B2.3 promoted to Current for token validation and telemetry pipeline

summary: Starting B2.3: Token Validation & Telemetry Pipeline - building CI validation and telemetry for token count accuracy

Token validation and telemetry pipeline complete: added telemetry instrumentation to token-counters.ts (Claude/Gemini warnings), created validation script (scripts/validate-token-counts.ts), GitHub Actions workflow for weekly validation, comprehensive tests (801/801 passing), and updated README + Phase 4 docs with accuracy expectations. Sprint 2 complete.
